About Us

Unique Solutions For Industries!

Manahel khaleej Trading Company est. was established in the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia. Our main areas of business are Project Support, Oil Field Supply Services, Industrial Equipment & Accessories.Manahel khaleej Trading Company is the leading supplier of well knownbrands to major industries in the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia.

With a modest beginning in trading and industrial products, we had the opportunity to diversify ourselves into multiple activities such as IT Support, Industrial Manpower, Office Automation and Hospitality Services. Our fundamental commitment has been to serve our customers with right products through one roof and to deliver customized solutions at the right time. At Manahel khaleej Trading , we have a strong commitment to detail and strive to ensure that every customer is fully satisfied.

Why Choose Us!

Our Specialization And Company Features

At Manahel Khaleej, we prioritize integrity, accountability, and customer-centricity. With a focus on reliability and efficiency, we invest in professional development to deliver innovative solutions. We strive for excellence, exceed expectations, and prioritize client satisfaction throug exceptional service and lasting partnerships.

Manahel Khaleej provides exceptional customer service and tailors solutions to meet client goals
